name: NOT SCARY
description:
you wake up in the haunted asylum you have to find a way to escape this nightmare before the insanity consumes you.

--------------------------------------------

how to play

w/a/s/d to move

shift to run

*while you run you lose stamina so if stamina reaches zero you will be exhausted and stroll so be careful*

you have to find 3 paper charms to get out. you will hear strange sounds when you are near the real paper charms.
